mapper.insert: insert into user( user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_address, user_eatlist, user_allergy, user_likelist ) values( #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address}, #{user_eatlist}, #{user_allergy}, "/1-N/2-N/3-N/4-N/5-N/6-N/7-N/8-N/9-N/10-N/11-N/12-N/13-N/14-N/15-N/16-N/17-N/18-N/19-N/20-N/" )
mapper.update: update user set user_eatlist = CASE WHEN user_eatlist is null THEN #{user_eatlist} ELSE concat(user_eatlist, concat(',', #{user_eatlist})) END where user_id = #{user_id}
